subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Ryan Giggs, a 40-year-old midfielder making his managerial debut, led Manchester United to a victory over Norwich, ending a tumultuous week that started with David Moyes’s dismissal.
snippet: Ryan Giggs, a 40-year-old midfielder making his managerial debut, led Manchester United to a victory over Norwich, ending a tumultuous week that started with David Moyes’s dismissal.
